metadata.Plot: During the 16th century, Japanese pirates proliferate along the Chinese coastline. In 1557, the pirates take over Cengang in Zhejiang. After months of futile advances, Commander Yu (Sammo Hung) finally defeats them under the leadership of newly promoted General Qi (Vincent Zhao). The Pirates, however, manage to escape.
metadata.Writer: Frankie Tam, Maria Wong, MengZhang Wu
metadata.Actors: Wenzhuo Zhao, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung, Regina Wan
